CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Launch in Market stage positioned above or below the In-Store Promotion stage?
SRP.A: The Launch in Market stage is positioned {above} the In-Store Promotion stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage In-Store Promotion?
VE.A: The value of stage In-Store Promotion is {982}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Launch in Market?
VE.A: The value of stage Launch in Market is {1943}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {1176}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {3500}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is In-Store Promotion, with a value of {982}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {194} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement?
SC.A: Decreased by {767} Thousand Bottles from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1079? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {3500}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {1943}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {1176}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1559? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {1176}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {982}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1079 and 2721? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {1943}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {1176}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to {Retail Placement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Retail Placement} and {In-Store Promotion} stages.
